name: Jira Batch Create Issues Test
description: Test case for creating multiple Jira issues in batch using jira_batch_create_issues tool

parts.text: Create 3 issues in batch: 1) 'Setup CI/CD pipeline' (Task), 2) 'Write API documentation' (Task), and 3) 'Security vulnerability assessment' (Bug). Use the jira_batch_create_issues tool.
I'll create all 3 issues in a single batch operation using the jira_batch_create_issues tool.
